name: The Culling (itch)
description:
They came and threatened the only thing he cared about.. TIME!

Mow down mass waves of purples to gain points, loot, and a big bloody mess! Don't be afraid to commit suicide when you have "LIVES" available either!

Entered as Inverted Games for the 2017 Home of Nerds Game Jam.

Hotwings#1425 Shawneth#9856 SM#9249 willhelliwell#3307

Hope you enjoy!
